title: FS: SGC graded T206: SL, HOF, and more - moved to Ebay

posts.post_title: FS: SGC graded T206: SL, HOF, and more - moved to Ebay
posts.post_content:
Prices include delivery; paypal gift/money owed is preferred.  [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100037&view=grid&bgcolor=black&sel=0"]High resolution images of all are available here[/URL]:

Jimmy Hart (P350) SGC50 - $180
Bill Hart (OM) SGC40 - $120
George Davis (P150) SGC30 - $75
Charlie Rhodes (P350) SGC50 - SOLD
Bud Sharpe (P350) SGC30 - $25 
Bobby Byrne (SC350-30) SGC30 - SOLD
Charley Carr (SC350-25) SGC10 - $17
